Text: Listing of the works of the Maître de Laz:  His work, dating to around 1527, can be seen in various parts of Brittany.
Triplets:<Maître de Laz

Listing of the works of the Maître de Laz:  He executed pietàs in Laz, Finistère, Briec-de-l'Odet, Saint-Hernin and Plourac'h and in Plourac'h, he executed statuary for the parish church.

Text: Listing of the works of the Maître de Laz:  Grés feldspathique had been used earlier in Laz in 1350 with a statue of a dying cavalier placed by the chevet of the Église Saint-Germain-et-Saint-Louis.
